TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BR0Qc:ref

Customer has requested update for the ticket 00410960
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #410960 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BR0Qc:ref - Customer is requesting update

TextBody:
Hi Jaimie,

Unfortunately EPP does not cover the use case that you described. Currently we can only block print screens/screenshots as a whole, and not for particular websites.

If you would like I can raise this as a Feature Request internally with our dev team to see if this is in the scope of a DLP and see if it can be implemented in future versions of the EPP server.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
